name: Cat Army Tool Maker Sim
description:
Its a game made for Big Brain Jam v1 and it was alot of fun to make!

dont expect to much of it

you are a evil blacksmith who makes tools for an army who kills cats (o no).

place ignots in the furnace and cool them after that craft weapons on the crafting bench than YEET them to the person!

made with unity and blender.
